name: Blind Seer
aura: Increases Ally DEF in All Battles by 34%.

skills.desc: Attacks 3 times at random. Each hit has a 30% chance of decreasing the Turn Meter by 15%.
skills.name: Visions of Death
skills.books:
Level 2: Damage +5%
Level 3: Damage +10%
Level 4: Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Level 5: Buff/Debuff Chance +5%

skills.desc: Places a [Block Debuffs] buff on all allies for 2 turns, then places a [Shield] buff on all allies for equal to 30% of this Champion's MAX HP for 2 turns.
skills.name: Dark Shroud
skills.books:
Level 2: Shield +5%
Level 3: Shield +5%
Level 4: Shield +5%
Level 5: Cooldown -1

skills.desc: Revives all dead allies to 35% HP. Places a [Block Damage] buff on all allies except this Champion for 1 turn.
skills.name: Self Sacrifice
skills.books:
Level 2: Heal +5%
Level 3: Heal +5%
Level 4: Heal +5%
Level 5: Cooldown -1
